section.name: Configuration Service
section.p: This service based on Commons Configuration and gives you access to all features of the Commons Configuration library with one extension: The ConfigurationService resolves the kind of the needed configuration interface by the extension of your file/resource.
The ConfigurationService dont need any contribution.
